text: Scent Dance IV ( 香之舞 IV ) is a work for solo piano, composed by He Xuntian in 2012. ==Summary== He Xuntian adopted RD Composition and SS Composition in his work Scent Dance IV. ==Inspiration== Scent Dance IV was inspired from Xuntian He’s ideology: Udumbara don’t smell like papaver. Five Nons: Non-Western, non-Eastern, non-academic, non-folk, and non-non. ==References== ==External links== *Scent Dance IV, Dances of Our Time published by Schott Musik International, Germany *Scent Dance IV - Petrushka Project, YouTube Category:Compositions for piano by He Xuntian Category:Compositions for solo piano Category:2012 compositions
title: Scent Dance IV
